basic_information.scholarship_name: Lucille Hurd Perkins Political Science Graduate Student Scholarship

description: This scholarship is in memory of Lucille Perkins who received her master's degree in Political Science at UCO and later became a political and civic activist. Eligibility Requirements Must be pursuing a master's degree in Political Science Full-time student

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: SIS_Classification is 1st Year Graduate   or SIS_Classification is 2nd Year Graduate   or SIS_Level is Graduate
